gurmukhi: cMf kop kir cMfkw ey AwXuD kr lIn ]
transliteration: Channd Kop Kar(i) Channdakaa E Aayudh Kar Loon||
translation: In fierce rage, Chandika took the weapons in her hands;

gurmukhi: inkit ibkit pur dYq ky GMtw kI Dun kIn ]28]
transliteration: Nikattee Bikattee Pur Dait Ke Ghantaa Koo Dhoun Koon||28||
translation: And near the city of demons, raised the horrible sound of her gong.28.

gurmukhi: suin GMtw kyhir sbd Asurn Ais rn lIn ]
transliteration: Soun(i0 Ghantaa Kehar(i) Sabad Asuran As(i) Ran Loon||
translation: Hearing the loud voice of the gong, and the lion-demons holding their swords entered the battlefield.

gurmukhi: cVy kop kY jUQ huie jqn ju`D ko kIn ]29]
transliteration: Chade Kop Kai Jeeth Hue Jatan Juddh Ko Koon||29||
translation: They came furiously in great numbers and began to wage the war.29.

gurmukhi: pYqwlIs pdm Asur sijXo ktk cqurMg ]
transliteration: Paitaaloos Padam Asur Sajiyo Katak Chaturan||
translation: Forty-five padam army of the demons adorned with their four divisions.

gurmukhi: kCu bweyN kCu dwhnY kCu Bt niRp ky sMig ]30]
transliteration: Kachh(u) Baaen Kachh(u) Daahanai Kachh(u) Bhat Nrip Ke San||30||
translation: Some on the left and some on the right and some warriors with the king.30.

gurmukhi: Bey iek`Ty dl pdm ds pMdH Aru bIs ]
transliteration: Bhae Ikatthe Dal Padam Das Pandrah Ar(u) Bees||
translation: All the army of forty-five padam was divided into ten, fifteen and twenty.

gurmukhi: pMdH kIny dwhny ds bweyN sMig bIs ]31]
transliteration: Pandrah Keene Daahane Das Baaen San(i) Boos||31||
translation: Fifteen on the right, ten of the left, followed by twenty with the king.31.

gurmukhi: daur sBY iek bwr hI dYq su Awey hY cMf ky swmuih kwry ]
transliteration: Daur Sabhai Ik Baar Hoo Dait Su Aae Hai Channd Ke Saamuh(i) Kdare||
translation: All those black demons ran and stood before Chandika.

gurmukhi: lY kir bwn kmwnn qwn Gny Aru kop soN isMG pHwry ]
transliteration: Lai Kar(i) Baan Kamaanan Taan Ghane Ar(u) Kop Son Singh Prahdare||
translation: Taking arrows with extended bows, many enemies in great fury attacked the lion.

gurmukhi: cMf sMBwr qbY krvwr hkwr kY sqR smUh invwry ]
transliteration: Channd Sanbhaar Tabai Karvaar Hakaar Kai Satra Samoond Nivdare||
translation: Protecting herself from all attacks, and challenging all the enemies, Chandika dispelled them.

gurmukhi: KwNfv jwrn ko AgnI iqh pwrQ nY jnu myG ibfwry ]32]
transliteration: Khaandav Jaaran Ko Agnoo Tih Paarath Nai Jan(u) Megh Biddare||32||
translation: Just as Arjuna had dispelled the clouds, which came to protect the Khandav forest from being burnt by fire.32.
